verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David. A Maskil.) How blessed <S%H835><s%> is he whose transgression <S%H6588><s%> is forgiven, <S%H5375><s%> Whose sin <S%H2401><s%> is covered! <S%H3680><s%>

How blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> to whom the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does not impute <S%H2803><s%> iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> And in whose spirit <S%H7307><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> deceit! <S%H7423><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> I kept <S%H2790><s%> silent <S%H2790><s%> [about my sin], my body <S%H6106><s%> wasted <S%H1086><s%> away <S%H1086><s%> Through my groaning <S%H7581><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long.

For day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> was heavy <S%H3513><s%> upon me; My vitality <S%H3955><s%> was drained <S%H2015><s%> away [as] with the fever <S%H2725><s%> heat <S%H2725><s%> of summer. <S%H7019><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

I acknowledged <S%H3045><s%> my sin <S%H9128><s%> to Thee, And my iniquity <S%H5771><s%> I did not hide; <S%H3680><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> "I will confess <S%H3034><s%> my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>"; And Thou didst forgive <S%H5375><s%> the guilt <S%H5771><s%> of my sin. <S%H9128><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2088><s%> let everyone <S%H3605><s%> who is godly <S%H2623><s%> pray <S%H6419><s%> to Thee in a time <S%H6256><s%> when Thou mayest be found; <S%H4672><s%> Surely <S%H7534><s%> in a flood <S%H7858><s%> of great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> they shall not reach <S%H5060><s%> him.

Thou art my hiding <S%H5643><s%> place; <S%H5643><s%> Thou dost preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from trouble; <S%H9496><s%> Thou dost surround <S%H5437><s%> me with songs <S%H7438><s%> of deliverance. <S%H6405><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

I will instruct <S%H7919><s%> you and teach <S%H3384><s%> you in the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> you should go; <S%H1980><s%> I will counsel <S%H3289><s%> you with My eye <S%H5869><s%> upon you.

Do not be as the horse <S%H5483><s%> or as the mule <S%H6505><s%> which have <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> understanding, <S%H995><s%> Whose trappings <S%H5716><s%> include bit <S%H4964><s%> and bridle <S%H7448><s%> to hold <S%H1102><s%> them in check, <S%H1102><s%> [Otherwise] they will not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to you.
Many <S%H7227><s%> are the sorrows <S%H4341><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> But he who trusts <S%H982><s%> in the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> shall surround <S%H5437><s%> him.

Be glad <S%H8055><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> you righteous <S%H6662><s%> ones, <S%H6662><s%> And shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy, <S%H7442><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you who are upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
